generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with tram tracks running down its center, marked with white dashed lines, and extending into the distance.
- sidewalk: Sidewalks are visible on both sides of the road, bordered by curbs and trees, with pedestrians walking on them.
- building: Multi-story buildings line the left side of the street, featuring windows and doors, typical of urban architecture.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including traffic light poles and signposts along the sidewalks and street.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible on the left side of the road, mounted on a pole near the crosswalk.
- traffic sign: Various traffic signs are present, including a blue directional sign and a "no parking" sign on the left side of the road.
- vegetation: Trees with dense foliage line the right side of the road, providing shade and greenery.
- terrain: Small patches of grass are visible along the edges of the sidewalk and between the trees on the right side.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing bright and clear.
- person: Pedestrians are visible walking on the sidewalks, including one person on the left side and another on the right side.
- car: A silver car is parked on the left side of the road, near the sidewalk.
- train: The image shows tram tracks embedded in the road, indicating the presence of a tram system, although no tram is visible in the frame.
